attributes.action: Block skys attempt to launch PICNIC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sky want to confuse the digital terestrial  market and launch a new service called PICNIC.

They will remove their channels from Freeview and create a competing subscription service.

This will confuse people already having problems switching and will reduce the choice of channels on the freeview service!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
